title: Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - Ethanol Fire Pit, Fire Bowl, Mini Personal Fireplace for Indoor & Garden - Bio Ethanol Fuel
descriptions:
Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit – Graphite

Create a warm, cozy atmosphere anywhere with the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit. Compact yet striking, this mini ethanol fire pit brings real, dancing flames to your table setting—perfect for indoor ambiance, outdoor evenings, and roasting treats.

Key features:
- Clean-burning fuel: Designed for bio ethanol use, including Roundfire premium fuels with safety flashback arrestors for a safer, low-odor burn.
- Long burn time: Enjoy real flame for over 1 hour per fill; ceramic wool insert improves efficiency and extends burn duration.
- Elegant, durable design: Solid concrete body in graphite with a marble-effect base that dissipates heat while adding a refined, modern look.
- Safer by design: Stainless steel burn cup prevents leakage, rapidly cools after use, and pairs with the included flat stainless steel extinguisher tool for quick, controlled flame-out.
- Heat protection: Heat-dissipating base helps protect tabletops and surfaces during use.
- Portable ambiance: Lightweight and easy to move—ideal for dining tables, coffee tables, patios, and balconies.
- Fun and functional: Great for table décor and perfect for cooking s’mores and toasting marshmallows.

Specifications:
- Type: Tabletop ethanol fire pit
- Material: Concrete body; stainless steel burn cup
- Color: Graphite with marble-effect base
- Fuel: Bio ethanol (recommended: Roundfire premium bioethanol with flashback arrestors)
- Burn time: Over 1 hour per fill
- Use environments: Indoor and garden
- Size: Mini, portable

What’s included:
- Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit
- Stainless steel burn cup with ceramic wool insert
- Flat stainless steel extinguisher tool

Bring real flame, modern design, and easy enjoyment to any setting with the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit. Clean-burning, portable, and beautifully made for everyday atmosphere and memorable moments.
